string-array.name: monday_full_body
string-array.item: JUMPING JACKS
SQUATS
PLANK LEG UP
BICYCLE CRUNCHES
REVERSE CRUNCHES
BOX PUSH-UPS

string-array.name: monday_full_body_description
string-array.item: Start with your feet together and your arms by your side, then jump up with your feet apart and your hands overhead. Return to the start position then do the next rep. This exercise provides a full body workout and works all your large muscle groups.

Stand with your feet shoulder width apart and your arms stretched forward, then lower your body until your thighs are parallel with the floor. Your knees should be extended in the same direction as your toes.Return to the start position and do the next rep. This works the thighs, hips buttocks, quads, hamstrings and lower body
Start in the straight arm plank position. Then alternately lift and lower both legs up and down.

Lie on the floor with your hands behind your ears. Raise your knees and close your right elbow toward your left knee, then close your left elbow toward your right knee. Return to the start position then do the next rep
Lie on your back with your knees up at a 90 degree angle and your hands behind your head. Lift your upper body and thighs, and then stretch out. Return to start position and do the next rep
Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands directly under your shoulders. Bend your elbows and do a push-up. Return to the start position and repeat

string-array.name: tuesday_full_body
string-array.item: CLOCKWISE ARM SWING
SIDE STEP JACKS
PUNCHES
OBLIQUE CRUNCHES - RIGHT
OBLIQUE CRUNCHES - LEFT
COBRAS

string-array.name: tuesday_full_body_description
string-array.item: Stand on the floor with your arms extended straight to the side at shoulder height. Move your arms clockwise in big fast circles. Try to do it fast as you can.
Stand upright with your feet together and arms by your sides. Step one foot out to the side, raise your arms up and bring your hands overhead. Return, switch sides and repeat the exercise.

Stand with one of your legs forward and your knees bent slightly. Bend your elbows and clench your fist infront of your face. Extend one arm forward with the palm facing the floor. Take the arm back and repeat with the other arm.
Stand with your right hand lifted overhead and left hand on your waist. Bring your right elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat
Stand with your left hand lifted overhead and right hand on your waist. Bring your left elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat
Lie down on your stomach and bend your elbows with your hands beneath your shoulders. Then push your chest up off the ground as far as possible. Return to the start position and repeat.

string-array.name: wednesday_full_body
string-array.item: DONKEY KICKS - LEFT
DONKEY KICKS - RIGHT
PLANK LEG UP
SPLIT SQUAT - LEFT
SPLIT SQUAT - RIGHT
BICYCLE CRUNCHES

string-array.name: wednesday_full_body_description
string-array.item: Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands under your shoulders. Then lift your left leg and squeeze your butt as much as you can. Go back to the start position and repeat the exercise

Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands under your shoulders. Then lift your right leg and squeeze your butt as much as you can. Go back to the start position and repeat the exercise
Start in the straight arm plank position. Then alternately lift and lower both your legs up and down

Stand a few steps away from a bench/raised surface. Rest your left foot on the bench behind you. Lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the floor and your front thigh is parallel to the floor. Keep your upper body straight. Then go back to the start and repeat the exercise.

Stand a few steps away from a bench/raised surface. Rest your right foot on the bench behind you. Lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the floor and your front thigh is parallel to the floor. Keep your upper body straight. Then go back to the start and repeat the exercise.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Bring your knee to your opposite elbow. Return to the start position and repeat with the other side.

string-array.name: thursday_full_body
string-array.item: JUMPING JACKS
SQUATS
PLANK LEG UP
BICYCLE CRUNCHES
REVERSE CRUNCHES
BOX PUSH-UPS

string-array.name: thursday_full_body_description
string-array.item: Start with your feet together and your arms by your side, then jump up with your feet apart and your hands overhead. Return to the start position then do the next rep. This exercise provides a full body workout and works all your large muscle groups.

Stand with your feet shoulder width apart and your arms stretched forward, then lower your body until your thighs are parallel with the floor. Your knees should be extended in the same direction as your toes.Return to the start position and do the next rep. This works the thighs, hips buttocks, quads, hamstrings and lower body
Start in the straight arm plank position. Then alternately lift and lower both legs up and down.

Lie on the floor with your hands behind your ears. Raise your knees and close your right elbow toward your left knee, then close your left elbow toward your right knee. Return to the start position then do the next rep
Lie on your back with your knees up at a 90 degree angle and your hands behind your head. Lift your upper body and thighs, and then stretch out. Return to start position and do the next rep
Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands directly under your shoulders. Bend your elbows and do a push-up. Return to the start position and repeat

string-array.item: CLOCKWISE ARM SWING
SIDE STEP JACKS
PUNCHES
OBLIQUE CRUNCHES - RIGHT
OBLIQUE CRUNCHES - LEFT
COBRAS

string-array.name: friday_full_body_description
string-array.item: Stand on the floor with your arms extended straight to the side at shoulder height. Move your arms clockwise in big fast circles. Try to do it fast as you can.
Stand upright with your feet together and arms by your sides. Step one foot out to the side, raise your arms up and bring your hands overhead. Return, switch sides and repeat the exercise.

Stand with one of your legs forward and your knees bent slightly. Bend your elbows and clench your fist infront of your face. Extend one arm forward with the palm facing the floor. Take the arm back and repeat with the other arm.
Stand with your right hand lifted overhead and left hand on your waist. Bring your right elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat
Stand with your left hand lifted overhead and right hand on your waist. Bring your left elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat
Lie down on your stomach and bend your elbows with your hands beneath your shoulders. Then push your chest up off the ground as far as possible. Return to the start position and repeat.

string-array.name: pre_workout_name
string-array.item: CLOCKWISE ARM SWING
LUNGES
PUNCHES
SQUATS
SIDE STEP JACKS
CAT COW POSE

string-array.name: pre_workout_description
string-array.item: Stand on the floor with your arms extended straight to the side at shoulder height. Move your arms clockwise in big fast circles. Try to do it fast as you can.

Stand with your feet shoulder width apart and your hands on your hips. Take a step forward with your right leg and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel with the floor. Then return and switch to the other leg.

Stand with one of your legs forward and your knees bent slightly. Bend your elbows and clench your fist in front of your face. Extend one arm forward with the palm facing the floor. Take the arm back and repeat with the other arm.

Stand with your feet shoulder width apart and your arms stretched forward, then lower your body until your thighs are parallel with the floor. Your knees should be extended in the same direction as your toes.Return to the start position and do the next rep. This works the thighs, hips buttocks, quads, hamstrings and lower body
Stand with your left hand lifted overhead and right hand on your waist. Bring your left elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat

Stand on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands directly under your shoulders. Then take a breath and make your belly fall down, shoulders roll back and head come up towards the ceiling. As you exhale, curve your back upward and let your head come down. Repeat the exercise.

string-array.name: post_workout_name
string-array.item: QUAD STRETCH
CLOCKWISE ARM SWING
PUNCHES
SIDE STEP JACKS
CAT COW POSE
COBRAS

string-array.name: post_workout_description
string-array.item: Stand on the floor, the bend your left leg and grasp your ankle or toes to bring your left calf close to your left thigh. Hold this position for a few seconds, then change sides and repeat. Your lifted knee should always go straight down, and your upper body should keep straight during the exercise.
Stand on the floor with your arms extended straight to the side at shoulder height. Move your arms clockwise in big fast circles. Try to do it fast as you can.

Stand with one of your legs forward and your knees bent slightly. Bend your elbows and clench your fist in front of your face. Extend one arm forward with the palm facing the floor. Take the arm back and repeat with the other arm.
Stand with your left hand lifted overhead and right hand on your waist. Bring your left elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat

Stand on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands directly under your shoulders. Then take a breath and make your belly fall down, shoulders roll back and head come up towards the ceiling. As you exhale, curve your back upward and let your head come down. Repeat the exercise.
Lie down on your stomach and bend your elbows with your hands beneath your shoulders. Then push your chest up off the ground as far as possible. Return to the start position and repeat.

string-array.name: yoga_name
string-array.item: CLOCKWISE ARM SWING
SIDE STEP JACKS
PUNCHES
OBLIQUE CRUNCHES - RIGHT
OBLIQUE CRUNCHES - LEFT
COBRAS

string-array.name: yoga_description
string-array.item: Stand on the floor with your arms extended straight to the side at shoulder height. Move your arms clockwise in big fast circles. Try to do it fast as you can.
Stand upright with your feet together and arms by your sides. Step one foot out to the side, raise your arms up and bring your hands overhead. Return, switch sides and repeat the exercise.

Stand with one of your legs forward and your knees bent slightly. Bend your elbows and clench your fist infront of your face. Extend one arm forward with the palm facing the floor. Take the arm back and repeat with the other arm.
Stand with your right hand lifted overhead and left hand on your waist. Bring your right elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat
Stand with your left hand lifted overhead and right hand on your waist. Bring your left elbow and knee to meet each other. Stretch out and repeat
Lie down on your stomach and bend your elbows with your hands beneath your shoulders. Then push your chest up off the ground as far as possible. Return to the start position and repeat.

string-array.name: monday_butt_leg
string-array.item: PILATES CLAM SHELL - LEFT
PILATES CLAM SHELL - RIGHT
BUTT BRIDGE
HIP BRIDGE & LEG LIFT - LEFT
HIP BRIDGE & LEG LIFT - RIGHT
SQUATS

string-array.name: monday_butt_leg_description
string-array.item: Lie on your right side with your head resting on your arm and knees bent. Lift your left knee upwards while keeping your heels touching, then go back to the starting position. Repeat the exercise.
Lie on your left side with your head resting on your arm and knees bent. Lift your right knee upwards while keeping your heels touching, then go back to the starting position. Repeat the exercise.
Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Put your arms flat at your sides. Then lift your butt up and down.

Lie on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Then lift your left leg up while raising your hips off thr floor as high as you can. Go back to the start position and repeat the exercise

Lie on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Then lift your right leg up while raising your hips off the floor as high as you can. Go back to the start position and repeat the exercise

Stand with your feet shoulder width apart and your arms stretched forward, then lower your body until your thighs are parallel with the floor. Your knees should be extended in the same direction as your toes.Return to the start position and do the next rep. This works the thighs, hips buttocks, quads, hamstrings and lower body

string-array.name: tuesday_butt_leg
string-array.item: DONKEY KICKS - LEFT
DONKEY KICKS - RIGHT
SPLIT SQUAT - LEFT
SPLIT SQUAT - RIGHT
BUTT BRIDGE
PLANK LEG UP

string-array.name: tuesday_butt_leg_description
string-array.item: Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands under your shoulders. Then lift your left leg and squeeze your butt as much as you can. Go back to the start position and repeat the exercise.

Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands under your shoulders. Then lift your right leg and squeeze your butt as much as you can. Go back to the start position and repeat the exercise.

Stand a few steps away from a bench/raised surface. Rest your left foot on the bench behind you. Lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the floor and your front thigh is parallel to the floor. Keep your upper body straight. Then go back to the start and repeat the exercise.

Stand a few steps away from a bench/raised surface. Rest your right foot on the bench behind you. Lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the floor and your front thigh is parallel to the floor. Keep your upper body straight. Then go back to the start and repeat the exercise.
Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Put your arms flat at your sides. Then lift your butt up and down.
Start in the straight arm plank position. Then alternately lift and lower both legs up and down.

string-array.name: wednesday_butt_leg
string-array.item: SIDE LEG LIFT - LEFT
SIDE LEG LIFT - RIGHT
PLANK LEG UP
FIRE HYDRANT - LEFT
FIRE HYDRANT - RIGHT
LUNGES

string-array.name: wednesday_butt_leg_description
string-array.item: Lie down on your side with your head rested on your right arm. Lift your upper leg and return to the start position. Make sure your left leg goes straight up and down during the exercise.
Lie down on your side with your head rested on your left arm. Lift your upper leg and return to the start position. Make sure your right leg goes straight up and down during the exercise.
Start in the straight arm plank position. Then alternately lift and lower both legs up and down.
Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands under your shoulders. Then lift your left leg to the side at a 90 degree angle.
Start on all fours with your knees under your butt and your hands under your shoulders. Then lift your right leg to the side at a 90 degree angle.

Stand with your feet shoulder width apart and your hands on your hips. Take a step forward with your right leg and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel with the floor. Then return and switch to the other leg.
